name: Promotion Class: Archmage
description:
Role: Ranged Damage

Some want to see the world burn, this master of magic wants to freeze the world. And then explode it.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +225
Critical Strike +9%
Increase Ice Storage Cap +1

Traits Granted:
Frostcaster Mastery

Enhancements:
Volatile Ice Weave: Now halves the time it takes to explode and reduces the enemy's Anti-Critical Strike.
Crystal Lance: Now removes the cooldown and causes execute damage to targets under 50% Health.
Shatter Storm: Now spawns Volatile Ice on hit.


WARNING:Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Archmage promotion class and prevents access to the Icecaller and Frostguard promotion classes.
